articles.title: Delta engulfs Southeast Asia with fastest-growing deaths - The Star Online
articles.description: SOUTHEAST Asia is emerging as a battlefield for one of the world’s worst Covid-19 outbreaks, due to the fast-spreading delta variant and the slow rollout of vaccines.
